Package com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem

Provides utility classes and interfaces to manage the life cycle of native instances, native memory attachment, read and write, and Dynamic Link Library managers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DLLManager The NativeManager interface is used to manage the Dynamic Link Libraries loaded by the framework.
DynamicLibrary The DynamicLibrary interface represents a loaded Dynamic Link Library (DLL) by the framework.
Fetch The Fetch interface defines the constants used to define what parts of the native memory layout of a native object tree must be read.
JNIEasyLibrary The JNIEasyLibrary interface represents the framework's Dynamic Link Library (JNIEasy.dll).
LockedRegistry LockedRegistry is a simple wrapper of a synchronized java.util.HashSet collection; it is included as a utility and can be easily replaced with your own.
NativeAddress The interface NativeAddress is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native address.
NativeBuffer The interface NativeBuffer is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native memory block.
NativeBufferIterator The interface NativeBufferIterator is implemented by the framework to provide a native buffer iterator.
NativeManager The NativeManager interface is used to manage the native lifecycle of native capable objects and some native memory tasks.
NativeStateManager Every native object instance has an internal object implementing NativeStateManager interface.
UnFetch The UnFetch interface defines the constants used to define what parts of the native memory layout of a native object tree must be modified.
 

Package com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem Description

Provides utility classes and interfaces to manage the life cycle of native instances, native memory attachment, read and write, and Dynamic Link Library managers.
